sentences.en: ‘He owns three hotels.’ The others looked suitably impressed .
sentences.cn: “他拥有三家酒店。”其他人都相应地露出了钦佩之情。

sentences.en: A large portico provides a suitably impressive entrance to the chapel.
sentences.cn: 小教堂入口处宽敞的柱廊相当壮观.

sentences.en: He felt suitably chastened and apologized.
sentences.cn: 他感到内疚并表示歉意。

sentences.en: He glanced at Juliet accusingly and she looked suitably abashed.
sentences.cn: 他怪罪的一瞥,朱丽叶自然显得很窘.
他走了，给人留下了不错的印象。
她的退场很富戏剧性，但似乎又是在情理之中。

sentences.en: I am not really suitably dressed for a party.
sentences.cn: 我穿这样的衣服参加聚会并不十分得体。

sentences.en: It is appropriate that everyone be suitably attired.
sentences.cn: 人人穿戴得体是恰当的.

sentences.en: Its headlines were suitably downbeat and don't scream out.
sentences.cn: 其标题平淡无奇而非触目惊心，非常得体。

sentences.en: She flicked her eyes up to make certain I was suitably impressed.
sentences.cn: 她抬眼瞟了瞟，以确定我不出所料地被打动了。

sentences.en: She was dressed in grey and looked suitably subdued.
sentences.cn: 她身穿灰色衣服,看上去颜色柔和,很得体.

sentences.en: She went home and returned more suitably clad.
sentences.cn: 她回家了,回来时穿得比较得体了.

sentences.en: There are problems in recruiting suitably qualified scientific officers for NHS laboratories.
sentences.cn: 很难为国民医疗保健系统的实验室招募到资历合适的高级科研人员。

sentences.en: These must be suitably proportioned to give the requisite degree of accuracy.
sentences.cn: 它们必须成适当的比例,以给出所要求的精确度.

sentences.en: Unfortunately I'm not suitably dressed for gardening.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是，我的着装不适合做园艺活。

sentences.en: We welcome applications from suitably qualified individuals.
sentences.cn: 我们欢迎符合条件的个人前来申请.

words.tran_cn: 适宜；相配；供给…衣服（suit的ing形式）

trans.tran_cn: 适当地，适宜地，相配地，合适地
trans.tran_en: having the amount of a feeling or quality you would hope for in a particular situation
